extends java.lang.Object

Peer

public Peer()
Method Detail

setSessionTable

public void setSessionTable(SessionTable sessionTable)
Sets the SessionTable used by this peer.

getSessionTable

public SessionTable getSessionTable()
Retrieves the SessionTable used by this peer. By default this will be a MapSessionTable.

getPublicKey

public java.security.PublicKey getPublicKey(java.lang.String local_id,
                                            HttpsecHeader header)
                                     throws HttpsecException
Fetch the public key referenced by header. By default calls getCertificate() and extracts the public key.

Throws:
HttpsecException

setPrivateKeyService

public void setPrivateKeyService(PrivateKeyService privateKeyService)
Sets the PrivateKeyService used by this peer.

getPrivateKeyService

public PrivateKeyService getPrivateKeyService()
Gets the PrivateKeyService used by this peer. Throws java.lang.IllegalStateException if there is no PrivateKeyService set.

getCertificate

public java.security.cert.Certificate getCertificate(java.lang.String local_id,
                                                     HttpsecHeader header)
                                              throws HttpsecException
Fetch the certificate referenced by header. Can retrieve certificates from data: org http: urls.

Throws:
HttpsecException

checkCertificate

public boolean checkCertificate(java.lang.String local_id,
                                HttpsecHeader header,
                                java.security.cert.Certificate cert)
Pre-condition, could be used to validate pki certificates. By default this returns true for any certificate that has been successfully parsed.

checkInitialize

public boolean checkInitialize(java.lang.String local_id,
                               HttpsecHeader header)
Pre-condition before anything happens to check the received initialize. By default this returns true.

getCertificatePublisher

public CertificatePublisher getCertificatePublisher()
Return the url of the certificate associated with local_id, or null if not known. By default this returns null.

setCertificatePublisher

public void setCertificatePublisher(CertificatePublisher certificatePublisher)

key

protected java.lang.String key(java.lang.String... s)
